relation_groups.name: WorksAt
relation_groups.description: A person works at an organization.

relations.name: works_at
relations.description: The person is employed or affiliated with the organization.

relations.name: employs
relations.description: Reverse of works_at: The person is employed or affiliated with the organization.

relation_groups.name: Develops
relation_groups.description: A person or organization develops a technology.

relations.name: develops
relations.description: The person or organization creates or improves the technology.

relations.name: developed_by
relations.description: Reverse of develops: The person or organization creates or improves the technology.

relation_groups.name: LocatedIn
relation_groups.description: An organization or technology is located in a place.

relations.name: located_in
relations.description: The organization or technology is situated in the location.

relations.name: located_in
relations.description: The technology is situated in the location.

relations.name: contains
relations.description: Reverse of located_in: The organization or technology is situated in the location.

relation_groups.name: Monitors
relation_groups.description: An organization monitors a person or technology.

relations.name: monitors
relations.description: The organization observes or tracks the person.

relations.name: monitors
relations.description: The organization observes or tracks the technology.

relation_groups.name: PartnersWith
relation_groups.description: Two persons or organizations are partners.

relations.name: partners_with
relations.description: The person collaborates with the AI.

relations.name: partners_with
relations.description: The person collaborates with another person.

relations.name: partners_with
relations.description: Reverse of partners_with: The person collaborates with the AI.

relation_groups.name: MemberOf
relation_groups.description: A person is a member of an organization.

relations.name: member_of
relations.description: The person is part of the organization.

relations.name: has_member
relations.description: Reverse of member_of: The person is part of the organization.

relation_groups.name: FightsAgainst
relation_groups.description: An organization fights against another organization.

relations.name: fights_against
relations.description: The organization opposes the other organization.
